name: Easy Sheet Pan Roasted Cauliflower with Curry
author: Fioa
summary: Try this simple, melt-in-your-mouth, roasted spicy cauliflower, with just a hint of curry. Perfect as a vegan side dish or even as a quick and easy main dish.
ingredients: 1 pound cauliflower florets, cut into 1/2-inch slices
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil
Combine olive oil, curry powder, lemon juice, salt, and ground black pepper in a bowl
Add cauliflower and toss until well coated
Place in a single layer in the prepared baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until golden and crispy, about 25 minutes
